testSteps.action: Click on the 'Contact' navigation menu item
Verify that the Contact page contains contact information or a contact form
testSteps.expectedResult: Contact page displays relevant contact information or form elements

testSteps.action: Verify that the page title or heading indicates this is the Contact page
testSteps.expectedResult: Page contains 'Contact' in the title or main heading

testSteps.action: Verify that the navigation menu is still functional on the Contact page
testSteps.expectedResult: All navigation menu items (Home, Products, About, Contact, Login) are visible and clickable

testSteps.action: Click on 'Products' to navigate to the Products page
testSteps.expectedResult: Successfully navigates to Products page with product filtering options visible
